Package ch.pschatzmann.stocks.strategy.allocation

Class SimpleDistributedAllocationStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.stocks.strategy.allocation.SimpleDistributedAllocationStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IExecutorAware, IAllocationStrategy, java.io.Serializable

    public class SimpleDistributedAllocationStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAllocationStrategy, IExecutorAware, java.io.Serializable
    We try distribute the allocation of investments evenly. If we have n investments, we limit the maximum investment of a single stock to 1/n of the total value.
    Author:
    pschatzmann
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
